meanings.sent1: She kept a tiny tsatske on her desk.

meanings.definition: To decorate with small, ornamental objects.
meanings.sent1: She liked to tsatske her room with fairy lights.
meanings.sent2: They decided to tsatske the Christmas tree with baubles.
meanings.sent3: He tried to tsatske the cake with sprinkles but made a mess.
meanings.sent4: The artist tsatsked the painting with intricate details.
meanings.sent5: The garden was tsatsked with colorful flowers.

meanings.definition: To collect or display small, decorative items.
meanings.sent1: She would tsatske seashells from every beach she visited.
meanings.sent2: He loved to tsatske vintage coins from different countries.
meanings.sent3: The child would tsatske stickers and arrange them in a book.
meanings.sent4: The museum tsatsked rare artifacts for the exhibition.
meanings.sent5: She proudly tsatsked her collection of antique dolls.
